headline: Is Carnival (CCL) Still Attractive After Its Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Carnival Corporation & at around US$30.18 is still good value after its rebound, you are not alone. The stock has seen a 6% decline over the last 7 days, a 5.5% gain over 30 days, is down 2.4% year to date, yet is up 21% over 1 year and has a very large 3 year return that is close to 2x, as well as a 45.2% gain over 5 years. These moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing investor interest in cruise operators, including coverage of Carnival's efforts to manage its...

headline: Holland America Line Introduces More Than 150 New Cultural Tours Worldwide
summary: Holland America Line is redefining destination discovery with two inspiring new shore excursion collections designed to turn every port into a personal connection. Introducing "Meet the Maker" and "Community Connections" — curated experiences that invite guests to go beyond the guidebook and immerse themselves in the heart of local life. From savoring family recipes at beloved eateries to learning time-honored crafts from artisans and engaging with communities that keep traditions alive, these t
